resume_text:
NAME: Carol Williams
EMAIL: carol.williams@email.com
PHONE: 555-246-8013

SUMMARY:
Highly motivated DevOps Engineer with 3+ years of experience automating and streamlining software development processes.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, Jenkins, Ansible, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2020 - Present)
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker to automate software deployments.
- Managed infrastructure as code using Terraform and AWS CloudFormation.

Systems Integrators - Systems Administrator (2018 - 2020)
- Maintained and monitored Linux servers and network infrastructure.
- Automated system administration tasks using Ansible.

EDUCATION:
University of Texas at Austin - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2018)
